content: knitted jumper in drops snow the piece is worked top down with raglan balloon sleeves and broad ribbed edging sizes xs - xxl drops design pattern no ee-723 yarn group e or c + c **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 550-650-700-750-850-900 g colour 91 grape needles drops circular needle size 9 mm length 40 cm and 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 8 mm length 60 or 80 cm for rib drops double pointed needles size 9 mm drops double pointed needles size 8 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needles of length 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge ** 10 stitches in width and 14 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
